originalText.text: The negative comments are about the receptionist not the Dr. Lessnau so I think it’s not fair. Dr. Lessnau is so great he’s the 3rd pulmonologist I had. He gave me a free sample inhaler because if I buy it, it’ll cost $100+. He’s great and he makes sure I get all the tests I need!

text.text: The negative comments are about the receptionist not the Dr. Lessnau so I think it’s not fair. Dr. Lessnau is so great he’s the 3rd pulmonologist I had. He gave me a free sample inhaler because if I buy it, it’ll cost $100+. He’s great and he makes sure I get all the tests I need!

originalText.text: I called this practice with the expectation of scheduling a self pay appointment, and my first point of contact was a very rude receptionist named Maria. This woman should not be working in healthcare at ANY CAPACITY!!!! Extremely rude and short with potential patients!!!! I never scheduled my appointment and found another facility that has staff that are kind to people. This message is for the provider of the facility SPECIFICALLY.... Its imperative that you ensure that your staff are kind to ALL people not just patients with the practice, because you never know who will become a future patient!!! If I could give zero stars I would, because the way I was just treated was a 0 star service!!!!!

originalText.text: The front desk receptionist Maria that answered the phone was extremely rude, I called to make an appointment and never made it that far. 1st she put me on hold in the middle of my statement because I have a stutter. Then she returned to the call and said hold on, she did not put the phone on hold she hung up. I called back and she raised her voice at me with an attitude. So I gave up and hung up.  If that's how the receptionist speak and/or deal with people I wouldn't want to be seen there.

originalText.text: Omg! Such horrible customer service!!! They don’t know whether the doctor accepts the insurance and keeps telling me to hold!!

text.text: Omg! Such horrible customer service!!! They don’t know whether the doctor accepts the insurance and keeps telling me to hold!!

originalText.text: I booked an appointment with this doctor on ZocDoc, but unbeknownst to me, was instead scheduled with lame PA who had access to the doctor by telephone.  Just awful.
